shows.title: Nakhane
shows.desc: A ravishingly beautiful voice — sumptuous, shimmering electro-pop sounds — echoes of Goldfrapp, Bowie, Nina Simone — we’re beyond delighted to welcome Nakhane. This South African-born singer, actor and writer renounced his Christian faith, feeling it to be incompatible with his queerness. His exquisite music speaks of his new-found sense of freedom.
